text: Joris August Odilius Ludovicus Vercammen (born October 14, 1952 in Lier) is a Belgian priest of an Old Catholic Church denomination. Vercammen was a Roman Catholic priest in his native country. He went to the Old Catholic Church of the Netherlands in 1988. He has been archbishop of this church since 2000. Joris Vercammen is married with three children. == References == * www.utrechter-union.org Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Archbishops Category:Belgian Roman Catholic priests Category:Old Catholics Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Joris Vercammen
